thread.title: Hayley Thompson

author: Hayley Thompson
title: Hayley Thompson
text:
I've an older dog, classed as senior. His food from tails.com has been catered to his needs, as he has a sensitive tummy and can be a fussy eater.
He loves his meal times and never leaves a scrap now and his food is gentle on his digestive system.
Yes, it's more than I used to pay for his food but it's conveniently delivered and I feel an older dog need a few treats in life!
